The exact mechanisms of MPs should be investigated further. Overall, our results demonstrate that PPMPs can promote tumor progression by promoting the inflam-matory cytokine IL-6 secretion and cell cycle progression in breast cancer cells. These data support new evidence of the potential risks of MPs.
